APP.TITLE: Tailored Web & Mobile Developments. FrontFlow.
APP.DESCRIPTION: FrontFlow is specialised in web applications and mobile developments.
APP.KEYWORDS: create website, website geneva, web development, user interface, user experience, ux geneva, web agency geneva, angular developer, angular application, mobile development cordova, cordova developer, web application development geneva

WELCOME.WEARE: FrontFlow is specialised in web applications and mobile developments.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our skills at your service.
SERVICES.UX: FrontFlow crafts web interfaces accordingly to your business and create quality user experiences to gain visitors and engage your customers.
SERVICES.CODE: With over 15 years of experience in web development, our workflow is safe and we always make choices that perfectly suit your needs.
SERVICES.BACKEND: No matter what you use as back-end technology (PHP, Java, other), we will define the best way to consume your data together.
SERVICES.TESTING: We use unit tests to ensure that every piece of code is clean before it goes to production. Each module is tested several times during the process.
SERVICES.DEVICE: Our applications are naturally responsive to all types of device screens: laptops, tablets and smartphones.
SERVICES.WORK: You can follow the progress of your project anywhere, anytime, in the customer portal.

TOOLKIT.TITLE: A tailor-cut toolkit.
TOOLKIT.ANGULAR: Angular is a kick-ass JavaScript framework developed by Google to create amazing applications.
TOOLKIT.SASS: For styles, we build everything using SASS. It increases productivity and avoid code duplication.
TOOLKIT.TYPESCRIPT: With TypeScript, we can now make JavaScript cleaner and maintainable. Less garbage, more code !
TOOLKIT.CORDOVA: We use Cordova to make your application available on most stores (Google Play, AppStore & Windows Store).
TOOLKIT.OTHER: We master other technologies such as back-end, continuous integration and mobile device management.
